channel.title: Npc hp bar and hits?
channel.description:
so i added a dungeoneering monster to the server, but on the server it doesnt have an hp bar, ive added it to the npc.cfg and the spawns.cfg? how come when i attack it you cant see my hits or the hp bar?
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5rP3x.png[/img]
Img showing what i mean
